Appearance
From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: version, versión, and vèrsion

German

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): [vɛɐ̯ˈzi̯oːn]
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: Ver‧si‧on

Noun

[edit]

Version f (genitive Version, plural Versionen)

  1. version

Declension

[edit]
Declension of Version [feminine]
singular plural
indef. def. noun def. noun
nominative eine die Version die Versionen
genitive einer der Version der Versionen
dative einer der Version den Versionen
accusative eine die Version die Versionen

Derived terms

[edit]
  • Versionsverwaltung

[edit]

  • “Version” in Uni Leipzig: Wortschatz-Lexikon
  • “Version” in Duden online
  • Version on the German Wikipedia.Wikipedia de
